footer_address_label: Address: Ayutthaya Branch: 1/214 Moo. 5, Khanham, Uthai, Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya 13210.
value_local_support: Local Support: Committed to employing Thai workers and supporting local suppliers to contribute to the community.
overview_title: Integrated Services Tailored to Your Needs
overview_gardening_desc: Expert maintenance, design, and seasonal care for lush, beautiful outdoor spaces.
overview_cleaning_desc: Professional residential and commercial deep cleaning for a truly spotless environment.
overview_security_desc: Trained guards, mobile patrols, and electronic surveillance for comprehensive protection.
overview_sewage_desc: Reliable maintenance, compliance testing, and repair of water treatment systems.
gardener_trimming_desc: Regular maintenance for perfectly manicured lawns.
gardener_plant_desc: Design and installation of new garden beds and plants.
gardener_pest_desc: Integrated pest management to keep your plants healthy and vibrant.
gardener_seasonal_desc: Preparing gardens for different seasons (pruning, fertilization, etc.).
cleaning_residential_desc: Deep cleaning services for apartments and houses, ensuring a sparkling environment.
cleaning_commercial_desc: Regular or one-time cleaning for offices, shops, and commercial spaces.
cleaning_post_construction_desc: Thorough removal of dust, debris, and residues after building work.
cleaning_specialized_desc: Window cleaning, carpet shampooing, and specific treatment services.
security_guards_desc: Professional, vetted personnel providing vigilant protection for premises.
security_patrol_desc: Regular and random patrols to ensure perimeter security and quick response times.
security_surveillance_desc: Installation and monitoring of CCTV, access control, and alarm systems.
security_access_desc: Management of visitor logs, gates, and internal access points for maximum safety.
security_cta_title: Protect your assets with peace of mind.
sewage_maintenance_desc: Regular inspection, cleaning, and preventative maintenance for all types of sewage systems.
sewage_sludge_desc: Safe and efficient removal and disposal of sewage sludge, compliant with environmental regulations.
sewage_analysis_desc: Testing and certification of treated water to meet local and industry discharge standards.
sewage_repair_desc: Repair of damaged systems and installation of new, modern, and efficient water treatment units.
sewage_cta_title: Ensure water compliance and clean discharge.
about_us_mission_text: Thame Services was founded on the principle of providing high-quality, reliable, and professional service across multiple essential sectors. Our mission is to enhance the living and working environments of our clients by offering integrated solutions under one reliable name.
about_us_team_text: We believe that our people are our greatest asset. Our diverse team comprises dedicated specialists in gardening, cleaning, security, and sewage treatment, all committed to excellence and customer satisfaction.
value_integrity: Integrity: We operate with honesty and transparency in all our dealings.
value_quality: Quality: We are committed to delivering the highest standard of service.
value_reliability: Reliability: We keep our promises and provide consistent support.
value_innovation: Innovation: We constantly seek new and better ways to serve our clients.
contact_hero_title: Get in Touch with Thame Services
